title: ARIAT Men's Solid Twill Fitted Shirt
description: Our fitted shirts offer a more tailored fit, slimmer through the chest and waist, with an extended body length for tucking
Greater Arm Mobility seam construction for maximum range of motion
Durable twill fabric and construction with double needle reinforcement topstitch
Capturing the essence of Western style, our casual shirts blend rugged handsomeness with comfort and quality construction.
